title: Learn to read quran
description: Our Mission And Vision is to Spread The Teachings Of Holy Qur'an To Every Muslim And Non-Muslim and Guide Them To The Right Path.

title: Learn to translate Quran
description: Here you will learn quran with the makhraj and some translation of arabic words

title: Prayer Accurately
description: Here we will teach you how to pray in the right way according to sunna and shariyah's law

title: Keep yourself safe
description: Here we will train you to save yourself from the fitna of this era in the light of quran

title: Understand Quran
description: Here we will teach you the basic things of research on quran, the plot of different sura etc

title: Adab of Masjid
description: Here we will train you about the adab of enetring masjid and some related hadith

title: Quranic History
description: Here we will be describing the plot of different verse and the history of amazing Quran

title: Islamic Caliphate
description: Here you will learn the story of the muslim heroes who once used to rule the world

title: Light of deen
description: Here we will teach you how to spend the time in the light of deen and sunna

title: Islamic Shariah
description: Here you will learn the basic law of Islam and the rules and also the best practices
